Shaping the Future of Manufacturing
WORLD MANUFACTURING CONVENTION
25 - 27 MAY, 2018
/
Hefei, China
/
CONNECTING THE WORLD

SUBJECTS

  • Creating the right ecosystems for smart manufacturing
  • Digitization as the future of supply chains
  • Intellectual Property strategies for smart manufacturing
  • Policies for sustainable industrialization
  • Leveraging the power of big data for productivity and competitiveness
  • Financing for smart manufacturing
  • How to create the greatest competitive advantage from Advanced Robotics and Artificial Intelligence?
  • «Made in China 2025»: A game changer for the global manufacturing landscape?
  • The new global manufacturing map: A new world manufacturing order?

COUNTING DOWN

5Days
16Hours
0Mins
39Secs

KEYNOTE SPEAKERS

  • Christian Wulff

    Global Chairman of GASME and Former President of Federal Republic of Germany

  • Ban Ki-moon

    the Eighth Secretary-General of the United Nations

  • Carlos Magariños

    Former UNIDO Director General

  • Philippe Scholtès

    Directorate of Programme Development and Technical Cooperation (PTC)

  • Dieter Kempf

    President of the Federation of German Industries (BDI)

  • Bruno Granjean

    President of the Federation of Mechanical Industries

ABOUT US

Launched by the Global Alliance of SMEs (GASME), World Manufacturing Convention 2018 is co-hosted by Global Alliance of SMEs, United Nations Industrial Development Organization, Anhui Provincial Government, Chinese People’s Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries. This convention will kick off in Hefei in May 2018.
